import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, Outlet, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Nav() { const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const navigate = useNavigate(); const logouthandler = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token"); navigate('/login'); } return ( <>
Logo
Home
History
{token ? ( ) : ( <> Login Sign Up )}
); }
